"Beastly Couple on White Summit":
"There's these ginormous native species deep in the
White Summit. Oh, dude, those things are dangerous!
They race around like speed demons and spew icy
breath. Talk about crazy scary! They're called
Snowbansers and Snowbanshees or something
like that. But whatever they're called, I wish someone
would go do something about them. I said, I wish
SOMEONE would go do something about them.
You dig?
*Target: Hostiles level 21 or higher"

"やべーって、あいつやべーよ！
凍土の奥地にいた、でっけー原生生物！
そのくせ、めちゃくちゃ素早く動き回る上に
氷のブレスも吐いてくるし
どんだけ規格外なんだかっつーの！
スノウバンサーだか
スノウバンシーだか知らねーけど
あいつら誰かなんとかしてくんねーかな？
あー、誰かなんとかしてくんねーかな？
※Lv.21～のエネミーが対象"
